item.title: Event Recap: Social Media News Mining | Tow Center for Digital ...
item.description: ... MS Dual Degree: Journalism, Computer Science · Blog · Latest Blog Posts · Previous Blog Posts ... 6:30pm for a panel on algorithmic accountability reporting. Nick Diakopoulos will kick off the evening with research from the Tow Center on the investigation of algorithms, and panelists from journalism, data science, and computer science will explore the range of what algorithms mean in society, and how journalists might investigate the power that algorithms increasingly exert on us.

Girls Who Code, for example, has eight-week boot camps that teach middle and high school girls programming skills – in languages like Java, PHP, and Python – as well as algorithms, Web design, robotics, and mobile app development.

item.title: Do we need to be more tech savvy? | Strategically Communicating
item.description: Any grounding in computer science will introduce the learner to the use of algorithms. Though it has many formal definitions, an algorithm is basically a recipe: a step-by-step process that results in a specified output.
